I misunderstood the `-m` tag. Apparently whenever we use this tag it imports module or a package and run it as a script. Sorry for that.
But I still don't understand why we get different errors for coala 0.11.0 and the coala 0.12.0.dev

I have two virtual enironment, One which has the actual deploy-able coala which gives me the output `0.11.0` and the another virtual environment which has the development coala which gives the output as `0.12.0.dev99999999999999`
Why doesn't the 0.12.0.dev999 report that the coala is a package.
